item.title: Entry 1- the comment tester
item.description:
Okay, so I am testing out how well iweb will work as a blog. Probably not going to be my first choice as I will have to have my desktop computer when I want to write. But here it is and I want to see if it is possible (and easy) for people to leave comments. So here are some topics in case you need one.
1. This winter is the coldest on record. What have you had to deal with as a result?
2. Do you like it when other people wear perfume or does it make you sick?
3. What is your favorite TV show right now?
